availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oliver H. Craig (Boone County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Frank V. Craig and Elvira Ann Craig. Resident in Boone County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Union in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 1, p. 199A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Union, p. 405.
Find A Grave, "Oliver H. Craig (Feb. 18, 1849-Mar. 6, 1924)," Memorial #86748291, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/86748291 (accessed May 29, 2020).
KYR-0001-004-0381.
